detail_desc: Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, frill trim at the top and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved, V-neck T-shirt in stretch cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and narrow shoulder straps.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and raw-edge, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved dress in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with a quilted shaft in woven fabric and a zip on the inside. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Low-rise joggers in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered side seams and a zip at the hems.

Straight-cut, knee-length coat in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, handwarmer pockets and diagonal front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and visible elastication at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey an appliqué on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit merino wool with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, drawstring down the front and a smocked back. Elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Lightly padded jacket in cotton denim with a faux shearling-covered collar, buttons down the front, fake top pockets and buttoned cuffs. Lined in soft cotton flannel.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with gathers at the shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Tapered waist with gathered seams for a gently draped effect. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.

Oversized, quilted jacket in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a wide collar and dropped shoulders.Off-centre zip and contrasting panel down the front, welt side pockets with a taped trim, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Taped trim around the collar, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft, patterned faux fur. Width 26 cm, circumference 70 cm.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Slightly shorter, wide jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section at the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front. Buttons on the shoulders, press-studs at the crotch and short legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre with a lace back section, low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.

Short, sleeveless, fitted dress in stretch twill with an off-centre zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Zipped side pockets and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with embroidered decorations and a slightly lower neckline.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam under the bust and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Sports top in breathable, functional fabric with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Suit trousers in sturdy satin with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases.
Calf-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly, jetted back pockets and slim, straight legs..
Longer jacket woven in a viscose blend with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in superstretch twill with embroidery, hard-worn details and a zip fly and button. Cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Lightweight jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with side stripes. Drawstring hood, a zip down the front, a yoke that is partially loose at the back, and zipped side pockets. Seam at the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in mesh. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.

Jacket in a woven cotton blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip, and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and patch pockets with a button, a concealed drawstring at the waist and a button at the cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Long, wrapover skirt in a viscose weave with ties at one side and a concealed fastening at the other. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in braided straw with a woven fabric band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Sandals in imitation leather with a decorative appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a glittery motif, zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 11x16 cm.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Buttons on the inside and a wide tie belt at the hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, concealed key pocket in the waistband and zipped hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-stud fastenings.

One-shoulder sports bra in ribbed microfibre with one wide shoulder strap and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, flounce at the top, open back with ties at the back of the neck and elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.

Short dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small, pleated frilled collar and V-neck opening with narrow ties at the top. Pleats at the back and long sleeves with metal buttons at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined.
Slim-fit, pull-on jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and front and back pockets.
Short, off-the-shoulder smocked top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wrapover front and back and short sleeves.
Sun hat in patterned, UV-protective fabric with ties under the chin. UPF 50.

Short blouse in an airy, patterned weave made from recycled polyester with a smocked stand-up collar and yoke with a frill trim at the front. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sandals in imitation leather. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Short-sleeved, circular top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and flutter sleeves. One with an all-over print and one with a print motif on the front.
Set with a hat and twisted tube scarf in a soft jacquard knit. Hat with a pompom on top, earflaps, a ribbed hem and fleece lining.
Slip-on shoes in imitation suede with a perforated pattern on the uppers, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Short skirt in a crinkled viscose weave with an elasticated waist, fake wrapover at the front and gathered flounces and a contrasting colour trim around the front and hem. Unlined.
